message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $825000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value this product can bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $775000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll be getting from it.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable going below $825000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $795000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value this product can bring to your business.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $780000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll be getting from it.

I understand that we're getting close to the final stretch, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $790000. This is the last concession I'm willing to make, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value this product can bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $785000 for the product. I think that's the best we can do, and I'm willing to walk away if that's not acceptable to you.
